articles.author: Santosh kumar.B
articles.title: Many who cracked Karnataka PSI exam sat idle in halls: CID evidence
articles.description: Close on the heels of forensic reports showing tampering of OMR sheets of aspirants in the PSI recruitment examination, the CID has gathered crucial evidence showing that several candidates who aced the exam had actually whiled away time in the halls.

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: ACB searches Congress MLA Zameer Ahmed Khan’s residences and offices; files illegal wealth case
articles.description: Sleuths of the Anti-Corruption Bureau on Tuesday raided Congress MLA Zameer Ahmed Khan and registered a Disproportionate Assets (DA) case against him, following a report from the Enforcement Directorate. The raids were carried out on five different places.

articles.author: Richa Pinto
articles.title: Over 200mm rain in 36 hours, 69% of July average received in 5 days
articles.description: The very wet spell for the city continued with over 200mm rainfall recorded within a span of 36 hours ending on Tuesday afternoon. With this, Mumbai has received 69% of its annual July rain in just the first five days of the month.

articles.author: K Sarojkumar Sharma
articles.title: 2 Tamils shot dead in Myanmar
articles.description: Two young Tamilians settled at Moreh in Manipur's Tengnoupal district were shot and killed at Tamu in neighbouring Myanmar on Tuesday, triggering an agitation by the local people that shut down the border town.

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: Kerala minister says Constitution 'condones exploitation', faces flak
articles.description: Kerala minister Saji Cherian on Sunday ridiculed the Constitution and said it condoned exploitation of workers, triggering condemnation and demands for his resignation. Cherian later expressed regret and claimed his remarks were twisted out of context.
